title: Law and Order: TrendVU 3/7: Gas Prices, NBA, Unfriendly, Disney, National Cereal Day
itunes:title: Law and Order: TrendVU 3/7: Gas Prices, NBA, Unfriendly, Disney, National Cereal Day
description:
In this edition of Law and Order: TrendVU, Jack and Miles discuss rising gas prices, NBA news, the Kremlin's list of "unfriendly" nations, Disney quietly backing 'Don't Say Gay' supporters, and National Cereal Day!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
